snippet: The defense secretary said that the Pentagon would not reduce its military deployments to the region or its focus on countering shared security threats.
abstract: Defense Sec Chuck Hagel, opening weeklong tour to reassure Persian Gulf allies worried about interim nuclear deal with Iran, vows that Pentagon will not reduce military deployments to region or its focus on countering shared security threats.
lead_paragraph: The defense secretary said that the Pentagon would not reduce its military deployments to the region or its focus on countering shared security threats.

headline.main: Hagel Seeks to Assure Gulf Allies of U.S. Commitment
headline.print_headline: Hagel Seeks to Assure Gulf Allies of U.S. Commitment

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
